issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Implement Dataset for reading JSON format
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15075](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15075). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We already have support for reading individual files, but not yet for reading datasets.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15075?focusedCommentId=17597245) by Edward Visel (alistaire):*
After this is implemented, [the Google Quickdraw dataset](https://github.com/googlecreativelab/quickdraw-dataset) is a nice freely-available dataset in ndjson to use for benchmarking and demos and such
